text:
Created attachment 29700
the patch to apply for adding pagination

I have added pagination to news module by using http://cocoon.apache.org/2.1/howto/howto-paginator-transformer.html 

It takes a page parameter for number of page. If this parameter is not pressent then it returns regular unpaginated view

It returns current page and total nuber of pages in span elements.
It also provides also for next/previous page when possible.
creator: elpacho@gmail.com

text:
Hi Leo,
thanks a lot for the updated patch. I tested it and committed it in r1418276.
creator: andreas@apache.org
